articles.author: Christian Edwards, Radina Gigova, Anna Chernova
articles.title: A breakaway region in Europe is asking Russia for protection. Here’s what to know - CNN
articles.description: Pro-Russian rebels in a separatist sliver of Moldova have asked President Vladimir Putin to protect their region from what they claim are threats from Moldova’s pro-Western government.
articles.content:
Pro-Russian rebels in a separatist sliver of Moldova have asked President Vladimir Putin to protect their region from what they claim are threats from Moldovas government.
